data.eml:eml: Fossil Ponerinae (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) in Early Eocene amber of France

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aria, Cédric, Perrichot, Vincent, Nel, André (2011): Fossil Ponerinae (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) in Early Eocene amber of France. Zootaxa 2870: 53-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206040
